text: Pinnar tan cakotara(n punyami)nin potiyi(naic cotippata)rku munnataka marravarkalin potikalaic cotikka arampittar. (Avarril atu kitaikkamal pokave) pinnar tan cakotaranin muttaiyiliruntu atai velippatuttinar. (Tan cakotaranai etuttuk kolla) yusuhpukku inta upayattai nam karpittom. Allah natinale tavira avar tan cakotaranai etuttukkolla (ekiptu) aracarin cattappati mutiyatiruntatu. Nam virumpiyavarkalin patavikalai uyarttukirom. Ovvoru kalvimanukkum melana oru kalviman irukkiran. (Anal, namo anaivaraiyumvita melana kalviman)
